inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Javelin'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Short Spear'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Long Spear'); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Proficiency, Spears
description: You are able to use javelins, short spears and long spears in combat.
